# Pull request

Thank you for contributing to Axiom Hive Core. This template keeps changes auditable and easy to review.

## Summary

Describe what this pull request does in two or three sentences.

## Changes

List the main changes:

-
-
-

## Checklist

- [ ] Code builds locally (`cargo test` passes).
- [ ] Python runtime still works with the supervisor (`cargo run --bin hive_supervisor`).
- [ ] Documentation updated if behavior or interfaces changed.
- [ ] No breaking changes without clear migration notes.

## Testing

Describe how you tested the changes. Include commands and any relevant configuration.

```bash
# examples
cargo test
cargo run --bin axiom_hive_cli -- "example prompt"
```

## Additional context

Add any links to design documents, issues, or whitepaper sections that are relevant to this change.
